titleStmt.title: An honest godlye instruction and information for the tradynge, and bringinge vp of children, set furth by the Bishoppe of London co[m]maundyng all scholemaisters and other teachers of youthe within his diocese, that they neither teach, learne reade, or vse anye other maner of A B C, catechisme or rudimentes, then this made for the first instruction of youth. Mense Ianuarij. 1556. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
titleStmt.author: Bonner, Edmund, 1500?-1569.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Caly, within the precinct of the late dessolued house of the graye freers nowe conuerted to an hospitall, called Christes Hospitall,
publicationStmt.date: The xxviij. day of Nouember. M.D.L.V. [1555]]

notesStmt.note: English and Latin in parallel columns.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the precinct of the late dessolued house of the graye freers nowe conuerted to an hospitall, called Christes Hospitall
